metadata.name: Cerulean Cloudscape
metadata.description:
'Cerulean Cloudscape' is part of the continued exploration of a series of artworks and techniques, now focusing on an increase of fine detail and seamless motion, resulting in a 1 minute loop of hypnotic cascading cloud like forms.

It will be on display at Satellite NFT Exhibition at Twenty Twenty Six gallery in Bondi, Sydney on March 9th 2022.
